title: Fight Club
short_description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Forrest Gump
short_description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events...

title: The Shawshank Redemption
short_description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
